usage.cn: 其实，那天我想说的是，“我们永远不要分开了好不好？”
usage.eng: Actually I wanted to say on that day,"Shall we never get apart,OK?"
Brothers, though geographically apart will always be bound by their blood ties.

usage.cn: 有时候，两个人要分开以后才会意识到，他们多想在一起。
usage.eng: Sometimes, two people have to fall apart to realize how much they need to fall back together.

usage.cn: 原来只要分开了的人，无论原来多么熟悉，也会慢慢变得疏远。
usage.eng: No matter how familiar we used to be with each other,as long as we are apart then we become strangers.
